tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pain Management for Chronic Back Pain,
review: Extremely happy and satisfied with Dr Joel treatment. Met him on the recommendation of a friend for a back pain issue which I was suffering for past few weeks. Tried all modalities but to no avail . All that was required was ' one touch to my spine  ' by Dr joel to diagnose right away that I had a bad muscle spasm and no bony issue . Though I requested for an x Ray he outrightly declined stating that an x Ray is of no use to me as he's already diagnosed the condition. Just one day of meds is all what I required to get significant relief in my symptoms . Very happy with his immaculate diagnosis, minimal investigation and treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I met dr Joel for a knee injury which I sustained 2 months back . I was diagnosed as a ligament sprain at multiple Locations and treated with meds and physio without much relief . Consulted dr Joel for the same and what impressed me the most was his way of approach in talking to patients and allowing them to explain their issues completely . Further he examined me and explained that I had a small tear which needed a small surgery . He alleviated all my concerns about the condition and assured me that I will be as before following the surgery . I feel much better now and my knee feels strong and sturdy after the repair . Highly appreciate dr Joel for his healing hands and highly highly recommend him .

**** *** ** ** ********* ******* Consulted him for  My wife who was suffering from a long term knee problem.He correctly sensed tears in ligament and Meniscus and asked us to get an MRI.When MRI confirmed his suspicions,he patiently helped us understand the need for surgery.He also advised on the practical problems post surgery during the rehabilitation phase and suggested us to have the surgery in our hometown so that we will have adequate support.I cannot recommend this doctor enough as He listens and answers every query patiently and is extremely empathetic.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your feedback

review:
He is one of the most genuine doctor/person I have ever met. He might be young but an expert in his profession.
I took second opinion **** *** ******** * **** ******** ********* ********** but the cost they told me was 4 times of what Dr. Joel did. At that time itself I got to know that Dr. Joel is genuine. I had H4 trauma to wrist. The surgery went really well and it has only been 1 week since he removed my plaster and I can already see good recovery and my hand is becoming exactly how it was before surgery.
Really recommends him to anyone who is looking for an expert orthopaedic doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited few times, got all the reports done and took the complete medicine course but no improvement. ****** ****** **** ** **** *** ***** ** *********** ************* *** **** **** ******* **** ****** **** **** *** *** ********** I am still suffering with the pain even after 4-5months so won't recommend this doctor to anyone....thanks
reply_text: From the clinic records it’s very evident that you have approached for treatment almost 2-3 months after an injury.  Recovery will be better if medical intervention is sought immediately after an injury . Further physio and rehabilitation was advised which was not done by you. Kindly follow the recommendations of the specialists for good recovery and outcome . Wishing you a quick and speedy recovery. God bless

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I met Dr. Joel for any injury which I have been suffering from the past two months. consulted many doctors who advised straight away for the surgery. but he examined me in detail and told that I only had a small tear in knee and it should heal nonsurgically. his confidence in diagnosing conditions instilled so much your faith in him. I feel so much better after consulting him . Gives minimal meds and focuses more on allowing the body to heal. Highly recommend him.

My experience with Dr Joel has been simply brilliant. He is on time, professional in his approach, listens to the problems & provides clear remedies with durations. He does not over explain the issues but rather has a calming persona. Highly recommend. 

I was treated by him for my lower back muscle pain which was earlier treated by a so called TOP expert o the city but Dr Joel finally took over & helped me recover. Keep up the fantastic work Dr Joel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Consulted dr joel for shoulder stiffness . Was suffering from the same for past 2 years . Met many physiotherapists and healthcare professionals . He diagnosed the condition immediately and recommended one particular exercise ( which none of the others have recommended ) . In just 2 days I see immense improvement in my shoulder movements . The pain has improved significantly too . He’s a very dynamic and friendly doctor . Explains the condition in detail and more importantly his treatment is impeccable . Highly highly recommend him .

Doctor is very friendly & true professional. 
He explained my problem with clarity. He gave sufficient time to examine my case.
** ** ************* *** gave the right assessment of my problems. Surely recommended Ortho. I have a better understanding of my problem now
